sourcesContent:
import { Fragment } from "react" import * as SC from "../../../styled-components/Popups" export const PopupSummary = ({ close_summary_popup, user_score, skip_question_count}) => ( {(user_score.length > 0 ) && (
The Game Correct answers:{user_score.filter(x => x.correct).length}Wrong answers:{user_score.filter(x => !x.correct).length}Skipped answers:{skip_question_count}Hints used:{user_score.map(x => x = x.hints_used).reduce((acc,y) => acc + y)}Quickest response:{(user_score.map(x => x = x.time).sort((a,b) => a-b)[0])/1000 + " sec" }Slowest response:{(user_score.map(x => x = x.time).sort((a,b) => a-b)[user_score.length-1])/1000 + " sec" }Average time response:{((user_score.map(x => x = x.time).reduce((acc, x) => acc + x))/user_score.length/1000).toFixed(3) + " sec" }
Score: {user_score.map(score => score = score.score).reduce((acc,score) => acc + score).toLocaleString()} points close_summary_popup()}>Close
)} )
